properties.body:
NORTHEASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
LEEWARD ISLANDS.
28 FOOT F/V LADY M, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS
ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE
FAILURE VICINITY SAINT KITTS (17-15N 062-40W).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450.
